pages.text: The $(8)Essence of Decay$() is the concentrated entropy of the undead. It can only be recovered from the remains of a $(n)Wither$().

Be warned: $(4)not every Wither$() carries this essence. It is a rare find, manifesting only when the Wither's soul is particularly corrupted. You will need this to craft the $(8)Sigil of Decayed Blood$().
